DataElement.preferredDefinition: The reason a patient was not able to participate in a clinical trial not previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Clinical Trial Ineligibility Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
